details.title: PM Modi pays tribute at Amar Jawan Jyoti
details.content:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi pays tribute at the Amar Jawan Jyoti. #RepublicDay2019 pic.twitter.com/mykhT7oxxP

details.title: Google doodle showcases Rashtrapati Bhavan, India's heritage
Happy Republic Day to all fellow Indians: PM Modi
details.content:
Happy Republic Day to all fellow Indians.

सभी देशवासियों को #गणतंत्रदिवस की शुभकामनाएं।

जय हिन्द!

— Narendra Modi (@narendramodi) January 26, 2019

details.title: PM Modi welcomes President Kovind, Vice President Venkaiah Naidu, Chief Guest Cyril Ramaphosa
details.content:
President, Vice President and this year's chief guest South African President @CyrilRamaphosa arrive for the #RepublicDay2019 ceremony pic.twitter.com/aYNbOqxRWN

— Doordarshan News (@DDNewsLive) January 26, 2019

details.title: Lance Naik Nazir Ahmad Wani posthumously awarded Ashok Chakra
details.content: Lance Naik Nazir Ahmad Wani posthumously awarded Ashok Chakra. He died in a fierce gun battle with militants on November 25. His wife accepts the award from President Ram Nath Kovind.

details.title: Param Vir Chakra awardees at the Republic day parade
details.content:
Of courage and determination!#ParamVirChakra awardees participate in the #RepublicDay2019 parade pic.twitter.com/RwcWXZBTPY

— Doordarshan News (@DDNewsLive) January 26, 2019

details.title: Army strength at display in the 70th Republic day parade
details.content: Visuals of the T-90 (Bhishma), the main battle tank of the Indian Army, commanded by Captain Navneet Eric of 45 Cavalry #RepublicDay2019. (ANI)

details.title: Veteran's tableau
details.content:
The Veterans tableau-2019, it showcases the theme, 'Veterans: Accelerators in Nation's Growth'. #republicdayindia pic.twitter.com/4vUsUyVzd6

— ANI (@ANI) January 26, 2019

Tricolour flies high at 18,000 feet at Ladakh
details.content: Indo-Tibetan Border Police personnel celebrating Republic Day India at 18,000 feet and -30 degree celsius in Ladakh. (ANI)
